de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.messages

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.messages.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommunityAutenticationAckMessage, CommunityAuthenticationMessage, NewFormationMessage, NewOfferMessage, NewPlayerOnMarketMessage, SaveFormationAckMessage, SaveOfferAckMessage, TransactionMessage, UserAuthenticationAckMessage, UserAuthenticationMessage, UserCommunityListMessage

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    A Message object contains and ID and the Content. The ID should be one of the IDs, defined in an class extends MessageIDAbstract.
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke
